name: PresenceOfGlucoseMonitorInHome
title: Presence of Glucose Monitor in Home
description: Indication of whether the person has a glucose monitor at home. (Business ID: Entry 559726)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Presence of Glucose Monitor in Home.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an indication of whether the person has a glucose monitor at home..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Presence of Glucose Monitor in Home.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Presence of Glucose Monitor in Home.)
